tools.name: get_feed
tools.description: Get RSS feed from any URL, including RSSHub feeds. This tool fetches and parses RSS/Atom feeds from any URL. It supports RSSHub feeds using the 'rsshub://' protocol and automatically tries multiple RSSHub instances for better reliability.

url.description: The URL of the RSS feed. For RSSHub, you can use 'rsshub://' protocol (e.g., 'rsshub://bilibili/user/dynamic/208259'). For regular RSS feeds, use the full URL.

count.description: Number of RSS feed items to retrieve. Defaults to 1. Set to 0 to retrieve all items.
